description:
This “Guide to Starting a Successful App Business” course is designed for non-technical entrepreneurs who are interested in getting involved with the iPhone app business. There are several skills app entrepreneurs can learn to increase their probability of success. For example learning how to prototype your own apps will allow you to communicate visually and more effectively with your developers/designers. The power of the app network will reduce your risk because now you don't need one hit app but can have several solid apps.

You get step-by-step guidelines and easy-to-follow instructions on exactly what to do and how to do it. No stone is left unturned. Everything that you will need in order to succeed in this most profitable endeavour, is provided. I can assure that there is no one else in the world teaching this method.

The course takes you gently through the intricacies of building an App business. It shows you what works and what doesn’t, and most importantly explains why things work the way they do so you can grasp key concepts and form strategies and identify App trends.

This series will give you all the information you need about a working and profitable App business, get in and enjoy the next revolution of cutting edge income channels.

I have Included a Free Downloadable Source code for every student to upload in the App Store in their name the code is in the "Register as a Developer" lecture
title: Guide to Starting a Successful App Business
